fullDescription.intro: Outputs the projection of a a relation (table) onto a set of attributes (columns), replacing one or more attributes by an aggregation of its values. The output contains as many attributes as the input, but aggregated attributes are usually renamed. The output typically has less tuples (rows) than the input.
fullDescription.option: Specify which attributes should be aggregated.
Specify the new named for the aggregated attribute.

ports.outPort: The output relation resulting from the aggregation.
